column5: Best locations on SPI, walking distance to the Entertainment District where you'll find bars, restaurants, and many fun things to do. 4 min walk to the beach with public access. Across the street from Blue Marlin Supermarket. Private backyard (just for this apartment) with a BBQ Grill. Two story condo with rooms on the second floor with a beautiful balcony with partial views of the bay. Good for couples, solo adventurers, group of friends, and families (with kids).
column8: 2 Bedroom apt, Backyard, BBQ Grill, 4 min to beach
